Class Hosts

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BulkResources<HostRestRep>, Resources<HostRestRep>, TaskResources<HostRestRep>, TenantResources<HostRestRep>

    public class Hosts
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<HostRestRep>
implements TenantResources<HostRestRep>, TaskResources<HostRestRep>
    Hosts resources.

    Base URL: /compute/hosts

      • deactivate

        public Task<HostRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id,
                           boolean detachStorage)
        Deactivates a host.

        API Call: POST /compute/hosts/{id}/deactivate?detach_storage={detachStorage}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the host to deactivate.
        detachStorage - if true, will first detach storage.

      • deactivate

        public Task<HostRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id,
                           boolean detachStorage,
                           boolean deactivateBootVolume)
        Deactivates a host.

        API Call: POST /compute/hosts/{id}/deactivate?detach_storage={detachStorage}&deactivate_boot_volume={deactivateBootVolume}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the host to deactivate.
        detachStorage - if true, will first detach storage.
        deactivateBootVolume - if true, and if the host was provisioned by ViPR the associated boot volume (if exists) will be deactivated

      • detachStorage

        public Task<HostRestRep> detachStorage(java.net.URI id)
        Detaches storage from a host.

        API Call: POST /compute/hosts/{id}/detach-storage

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the host.
